attributes.title: Would rate 0 if I could
attributes.review:
This app is scary!!
They tried to get me to join some really scary movement 
All I wanted to do was support my loving president 
Instead my information was stolen 
My cat was murdered 
They tried to get me to join a cult
Do not download this app!! It’s dangerous!!

attributes.title: Fitting
attributes.review: The app has limited functionality and provides no tangible benefit to Americans, just like the President.

attributes.title: worst app on the app store
attributes.review: when i first opened the app, i saw these words “black lives do not matter and i hate women -trump” which already threw up a red flag. there was also a very unflattering photo of a deformed cheeto that actually made me gag. do not recommend

attributes.title: the worst omg 😡😡
attributes.review: i bought this app to support my president donald juicy trump 😍😍😍😍😍😍. unfortunately when i got it it crashed completely 😱😱. it then asked me for my phone number, they’re going to sell my information to china 😡😡. i do not recommend 😳😱🥴😡

attributes.title: This App Causes Major Brain Damage
attributes.review: The Trump App took so long to download. The app is very glitchy, and confusing.
